    • Method Detail

      • generateLink

        public void generateLink(java.lang.Long publisherID,
                         java.lang.Long merchantID)
        Randomly generates a link with a given publisher and merchant ID. This link will have a title of 10 characters, an original URL of 10 characters, a hash of 40 characters, and a group of 10 characters.
        Parameters:
        publisherID - The ID of the associated publisher
        merchantID - The ID of the associated merchant
